name: gridpaint
description: a canvas for creating grid-based art in the browser

scripts.prepublish: npx browserify examples/browser.js | npx indexhtmlify --title gridpaint > example.html
scripts.build-example: npx browserify examples/browser.js | npx indexhtmlify --title gridpaint > example.html
